[Groovy] Class GroupService

java.lang.Object
  grails.plugin.nimble.core.GroupService

class GroupService

Provides methods for interacting with Nimble group membership.

addMember

void addMember(UserBase user, Group group)
Adds a user to a group.
pre:
Passed group and user object must have been validated to ensure that hibernate does not auto persist the objects to the repository prior to service invocation
throws:
RuntimeException When internal state requires transaction rollback
Parameters:
user - The user which should be added
group - The group which should extend its membership with the supplied user

createGroup

Group createGroup(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, boolean protect)
Creates a new group.
throws:
RuntimeException When internal state requires transaction rollback
Parameters:
name - Name to assign to group
description - Description to assign to group
protect - Boolean indicating if this is a protected group (True disables modification in UI)
